<table>
<tt><td>*English*</td><td>*Scardf*</td></tt>
<tr><td>
Family members are resources of type "person"
</td>
<td><code>
val familyMembers = g/-/having( RDF.Type -> person )
</code></td>
</tr>
<tr><td>
All family members who have a male spouse
</td>
<td><code>
familyMembers/where( _/spouse/isMale? )
</code></td>
</tr>
<tr><td>
Triples stating that something's height is less than 100 (cm).
</td>
<td><code>
g.triplesLike( Node, height, { h: Literal => asInt(h) < 100 } )
</code></td>
</tr>
</table>
